name: src/assert.js
Assert
description: This Assert class provides asserting methods based on builtin schema generating, checking

name: seemMatchSample
description:
Try to check if the sample pattern matchs with input value pattern. 
Since the auto-learnt sample pattern could be incompleted, 
this function usage should follow the examples.

name: src/png.js
src/stream.js

content:
# causal-net.utils module

This module provides those ulitities class:

### Platform 
- Enhanced mixins with corresponding platform (node|web).
### Fetch 
- Fetch that works on both node and web environment.
### PNG 
- PNG parser.
### CSV 
- CSV parser.
### Stream 
- Readable, Writeable, duplex.
### Assert 
- Enhanced assert with schema learn from example.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "causal-net.utils",
  "version": "0.0.6",
  "description": "this is utils function",
  "main": "dist/@causalNet/utils.node.js",
  "browser": "dist/@causalNet/utils.web.js",
  "author": "nguyenhuynh200188@gmail.com",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "start:web": "webpack --watch --info-verbosity verbose --config webpack.web.babel.js",
    "start:node": "webpack --watch --info-verbosity verbose --config webpack.node.babel.js",
    "build:clean": "rimraf dist; rimraf ./docs/",
    "start:doc": "esdoc -c esdoc.json; cd docs/; simple_server",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:report": "jest --coverage",
    "build:dev": "webpack --config webpack.dev.babel.js",
    "build:prod": "webpack --config webpack.prod.babel.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.2.0",
    "ajv": "^6.9.1",
    "cross-fetch": "^3.0.0",
    "csv-parser": "^2.1.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "fetch-readablestream": "^0.2.0",
    "generate-schema": "^2.6.0",
    "nodemon": "^1.18.10",
    "platform": "^1.3.5",
    "pngjs3": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "jest": {
    "testEnvironment": "node"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.2.2",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.2.3",
    "@babel/register": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/types": "^7.2.2",
    "babel-core": "^7.0.0-bridge.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.1",
    "babel-jest": "^23.6.0",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.4",
    "eslint": "^5.12.0",
    "eslint-loader": "^2.1.1",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^3.2.0",
    "jest": "^24.1.0",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.13.1",
    "terser-webpack-plugin": "^1.2.1",
    "webpack": "^4.28.2",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.2",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^3.1.13",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.1.5"
  }
}
name: package.json
test/assert.test.js
test/fetch.test.js
test/platform.test.js
test/png.test.js
test/stream.test.js
